resources.string: Werewolf Party Game, choose 1 narrator and play from 4 players up to 10 players
Just Spin the bottle that can point out everyone
Spin our specialties wine bottle to point a person at the group. Just press the spin button and see where it points at. 2 up to 8 players recommended but could be more
Roll a Dice or three for your favorite board game
Use our dice to play with your favorite board games. Up to 3 dice available for your choice of games i.e. a Dice for Snakes and Ladders, couple for Monopoly, and maybe 3 for DnD.
Play our made in russian roulette game. Best to play with 2 - 6 Players, would you lucky enough to survive?
Flip our pigeon coin either its head or feathers
Flip our beloved Spartie the pigeon\'s coin. is it head or tails or maybe feathers?
